item.title: Housing Prices Jump Most in Three Decades...
item.description:
finance.yahoo.com
(Bloomberg) -- U.S. home prices jumped the most in more than 30 years in April.Nationally, the S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller index of property values climbed 14.6% from a year earlier, the biggest gain in data going back to 1988. That came after 13.2% increase in March, and was the 11th straight month that price gains accelerated.Home prices in 20 U.S. cities, meanwhile, jumped 14.9%, beating the median estimate in a survey of Bloomberg economists and was the biggest gain since 2005.“April’s perfor
